name: platformMaintenanceBonitaV1
description: Page allowing to enable and disable the maintenance mode

text.value: {{'The message specified here will be visible to users who are logged in. It should provide information about the scheduled maintenance time and the details of the updates. It is also displayed on the maintenance page when the maintenance mode is enabled.' | translate}}
{{'Maintenance scheduled message successfully updated.' | translate}}
{{'Maintenance scheduled message has not been updated, check the log.' | translate}}
You need to enable Maintenance mode when you make an update to your environment and you want to avoid users using the platform during this update.
When maintenance mode is disabled, users can use the platform again.

value: ? uiTranslate("Services will resume. Users will be able to use the platform again.")
: uiTranslate("Services will be paused for maintenance.");
? uiTranslate("Are you sure you want to deactivate the maintenance mode?")
: uiTranslate("Are you sure you want to activate the maintenance mode?");
